body:
my brother's have been bully's for years so they want to say sorry.so they want to make it up with me so they are building a pc for me.would i get 125 fps with this with sonicether's unbelievable shaders mod
SSD:samsung 840 evo 250 gbRAM:kingston hyper beast xmp 8 gb dimm ddr3-1600 kit 2 sticksMotherboard:msi z97 gaming 7procesor:intel core i7 4790k 4.0 ghz 4.44ghz turbo boost 1150 procesor grafics card:evga geforge gtx 980 superclocked 4 gb gddr5 256 bit

title: can i get 125 fps with shaders

replies.body: 60 fps is the max minecraft will take, looks the same otherwise
replies.body_tagged: 60 fps is the max minecraft will take, looks the same otherwise

replies.body: Unless you have a fancy monitor 60 and 125 will look exactly the same.
replies.body_tagged: Unless you have a fancy monitor 60 and 125 will look exactly the same.

reply_to.body: Unless you have a fancy monitor 60 and 125 will look exactly the same.
reply_to.body_tagged: Unless you have a fancy monitor 60 and 125 will look exactly the same.

replies.body: Are you seriosly asking if a gtx 980 will get 125 fps with shaders? My friends GTx 660 gets 60fps with that shader, the 980 is more than double that power
replies.body_tagged: Are you seriosly asking if a gtx 980 will get 125 fps with shaders? My friends GTx 660 gets 60fps with that shader, the 980 is more than double that power

replies.body: The other parts are importand to

replies.body: With shaders, the most important thing is the gpu. But his processor is also reaaallllly good, and will work without a problem.
replies.body_tagged: With shaders, the most important thing is the gpu. But his processor is also reaaallllly good, and will work without a problem.

reply_to.body: The other parts are importand to
reply_to.body_tagged: The other parts are importand to

replies.body:
OVERPRICED... try these specs xD:

  • CPU: i7 4770k
  • RAM: 8GB DDR3
  • GPU: EVGA GeForce GTX 770 Classified
  • Motherboard: ASUS MAXIMUS VI HERO
  • Power: Cooler Master Silent Pro M2 850W
But you should even run 150- 250 fps with those specs... My friend has the ones above and he gets 300 fps with these settings (Any shader pack):

Optifine: Yes
Render distance: 16
Graphics: Fancy
FOV: 110
Resource pack resolution (Max to handle standard fps): 512x512 
:P
